name: TriangleSquarePentagonCircle
description:
Summary

A 3x3 grid is randomly populated with triangles, squares, pentagons, and circles.

Make your prediction of triangle, square, pentagon, or triangle for each tile and you will be shown, for each row and column:

  • How many predictions were correct
  • How many predictions contained a correct shape but in the wrong position
  • How many predictions were completely wrong, dummy

You have 6 predictions to correctly work out the contents of the grid or you lose.
